Hi Heinhart, I do have the Dvd but my bandwidth speed is so slow it would take way too long to upload the Dvd + the avi is very close to the same quality as my Dvd5 anyway M8. Thanks for leaving a Comment, its a shame more people don't go to the same effort. All The Best From Captainwest !!!
